mainText:
A man who invented a career only to have been released for the hopes of 
better leader, visionary and CEO finds himself back where he began his 
work to change the world as we know it.  Today is a huge loss for the 
world to see a world class man, mentor, icon father, husband, friend and 
inventor pass before his time.  I am Sorry for this loss as I write this 
email on my macbook pro.
author: Tara
